About

Hyoeun Kim

Hyoeun Kim is passionate in interactive media and immersive experience design across all areas – game, design, and story. Currently, she is studying technology and creative writing to explore interactive media in New York.

She was born in South Korea and double majored in Korean Literature and Business Administration at EWHA Womans University. Before she moved in New York, she worked as a Film marketing senior analyst at CJ Entertainment, South Korea’s leading film production studio, for 4 years and participated in over 16 film marketing projects. Also, Hyoeun has professional experience in game industry. She worked as a game designer of ‘Vindictus’ for a year at Nexon, the biggest online game company in South Korea, and created game story and characters. Combining her knowledge and professional experiences, she aims to pursue a career as a producer of interactive media.
